documents.document:
Advantages of Engaging Culinary Activities for Corporate Tea

Having a culinary activity for corporate team building is a unique and educational experience for professionals. This is because learning proper food preparation and making enticing and mouth-watering meals for their corporate team building buffet becomes the doorway to enhancing better employee relationships and leadership coaching.

One of the wellness companies that provide dynamic and fun culinary programs for corporate team building activities is Gowings Food Health Wealth. Its goal is to bring corporate individuals together in a fun, dynamic, and interactive culinary arts experience that is a great alternative to the typical corporate team building activities. The Corporate Chef Services can cater from 16 to 60 corporate attendees available for in-house and on-site corporate team building events around Australia.

This type of corporate team building activity unites company crew and stimulates staff with exciting, safe and fun culinary incentive. It provides sessions that are the perfect pick-me-up for nurturing staff health.

Cooking together in corporate team building is a fantastic way of making new friends and a great way to bond with colleagues. It is a wonderful way to excel in a new area and share knowledge with others. This kind of corporate team building for companies is able to reduce absenteeism and revitalise staff for spring. It is also a motivational training incentive wherein professionals can learn how to cook or prepare simple, quick yet nutritious and savory dishes that are great for team fitness events or the perfect Christmas party.

This type of corporate team building takes on live culinary demonstrations that allow participants to perform on-the-spot cooking challenges in front of their colleagues and mentors. Also, the culinary activity challenge can stir up creativity and talent for providing delectable and tempting lunch or dinner buffet for the corporate team building. Now this is one good opportunity for professionals to get into this type of corporate team building with cooking awareness.

Gowings FoodHealthWealth is founded by Samantha Gowing. She is a woman who is passionate about food and has offered Corporate Chef Services for various organizations for over 10 years now.

For inquiries or bookings for Gowings Food Health Wealth, call +612-6685-5400 or visit http://www.foodandhealth.com.au/corporateteambuilding

Gowing Food Health Wealth Offers Corporate Chef Services

October 04, 2010 – Byron Bay, New South Wales, Australia – Gowings Food Health Wealth – founded by Samantha Gowing, a health and wellness company has offered corporate chef services as part of dynamic, fun and interactive healthy cooking activities during corporate team building seminars or workshops.

The aim of corporate team building is to bring office personnel together through a stimulating cooking activity as well as fire them up with a culinary boot camp with Gowings Food Health Wealth’s corporate chef team building for 16 to 60 people.

The corporate team building activity has 3 exciting sessions that are the perfect pick-me-up for nurturing the staff’s health during winter. The team building activity reduces absenteeism and revitalises the staff for spring. Plus, this is also a motivational training incentive for team fitness events or the perfect Christmas party.

The sessions include a:

60-90 minute workshop – This corporate team building activity involves a PowerPoint presentation that discusses about the huge amount of nutrition information available that helps participants understand the fundamentals of good health and wellbeing combined with a highly motivating experience.

3-hour hands-on cooking class – This hands-on cooking activity for corporate team building enabled everybody to stir the pot and taste the delicious outcomes.

4-hour motivational master class – This Interactive kitchen boot camp has challenged employees with a hands-on cooking experience that enabled them to create their buffet lunch during their corporate team building.

Companies that engaged corporate chef services for their corporate team building fostered co-operation, communication and team work to achieve set objectives. Plus, the said corporate team building activity encouraged team spirit, bonding and a greater sense of understanding to each other that helped companies and their team to improve working together.

For companies that want to book culinary lessons for their corporate team building activity, call +612-6685-5400 or log on to http://www.foodandhealth.com.au/corporateteambuilding

About Gowings Food Health Wealth

Gowings Food Health Wealth is a global wellness company based in Byron Bay, New South Wales. It was established by Samantha Gowing who has a great passion for food and generously shares her extensive knowledge about it by letting companies incorporate culinary lessons into their corporate team building activity.

Get Unforgettable Corporate Team Building

Ever heard of a wellness company that caters to corporate team building with cooking awareness?

Go to Gowings Food Health Wealth. They offer:
• 60-90 minute workshops.
• 3-hour hands-on cooking classes where everybody gets to stir the pot and taste the delicious outcomes.
• 4-hour motivational master class or culinary Olympics.

Certainly one of the best and unforgettable corporate team building that your company will ever have!

Call them at +612-6685-5400 or visit http://www.foodandhealth.com.au/corporateteambuilding

Corporate Team Building Culinary Workshop

Gowings Food Health Wealth offers inspiring health and wellness corporate team building culinary workshop that:

• Is presented in seminar and on-the-spot cooking activity form
• Can cater from 16 to 60 corporate attendees
• Is available for in-house and on-site corporate team building

This is a great corporate team building incentive in the comfort of your company boardroom and budget.

For inquiries, call +612-6685-5400 or visit http://www.foodandhealth.com.au/corporateteambuilding

Motivate Employees through Cooking

Companies recognize the importance of corporate team building. Aside from relieving employees of the daily stresses of work, corporate team building activities create an atmosphere of solidarity and cooperation among employees. There are several corporate team building activities that can be conducted within an organization like team games or sports. For a company looking for a rewarding corporate team building activity, cooking is a fun-filled innovative way to boost employees’ cooperation and morale.

With culinary corporate team building, every member uses their skills such as innovation, organization and attention to details while having fun and learning cooking skills at the same time. The even better thing about culinary corporate team building is that prior cooking experience is not necessary.

Companies do not need to worry about how to facilitate culinary corporate team building activities for their employees because wellness firms like Gowings Food Health Wealth will do it for them. Gowings’ Corporate Kitchen Program is an excellent way to reduce employee absenteeism and stimulate employees’ enthusiasm and motivation.

Gowings’ Corporate Kitchen Program includes:

• Food – Health – Wealth: 60-90 minute workshop
An exceptional PowerPoint presentation that aims to inform participants of the huge amount of nutrition information available. The session motivates participants to actively live a healthy lifestyle.

• Grill Seekers – 3 hours hands on cooking class
Every participant joins this 3 hour cooking workshop which incorporates nutritional information and seasonal produce.

• The Culinary Olympics – 4 hour motivational masterclass
Competition between teams harnesses group unity and this corporate team building activity does that. Every team makes a different dish for their lunch or dinner.

Furthermore, Gowings Food Health Wealth will provide the food, chefs, non-alcoholic drinks and equipment. After the excitement of food cooking and preparation, the teams sit down and relax to enjoy the fruit of their labor: the meals, appetizers and desserts.

Truly, investing in culinary corporate team building activities yields results that will improve employees’ performance.

If you are planning to conduct culinary corporate team building, visit http://www.foodandhealth.com.au/corporateteambuilding

Corporate Team Building in the Kitchen

November 02, 2010, 2010 – Byron Bay, NSW, Australia – the best organic culinary school – Gowings Food and Health – is now offering cooking classes as part of corporate team building.

Instead of the usual corporate team building that most companies do like sports, hiking or picnics, Gowings Food and Health offers another option for Corporate team Building. They offer cooking classes for all the corporate staff.

It can be an awesome, fun, and healthy way for corporate team building events. Food and Health offers “Corporate Chef Masterclass” good for 16 to 60 people. It will unite corporate crew and fire up the staff with an inspiring, safe and fun culinary experience.

The Corporate Team Building Culinary classes menu begins with the Entrée. It is a 60 – 90 minute inspiring health and wellness workshop that is presented in seminar style. The aim of the session is to make sense of proper nutrition available. It will help participants understand the importance of proper and good nutrition.

For the Main Course, they have a 3 hours hands on cooking class. Everybody will get the chance to cook and taste the food.

And for the Degustation, it is composed of 4 hours motivational masterclass. It will help corporate crew and staff to discover their hidden talent. They can even create their ultimate office cooking dream team! They will get to compete with other teams in the Corporate Team Building Culinary Olympics. Each team will cook different dishes to assemble the perfect lunch or dinner.

It will be a fun and exciting Corporate Team Building!

Having a Corporate Team Building Culinary Class will challenge employees to create their very own dishes to compete and present to the guests and facilitators.

So for more details on how to avail of Food and Health Corporate Team Building, just log on to http://www.foodandhealth.com.au/corporateteambuilding

Corporate Team Building Cooking Dash

Food and Health offers culinary classes for Corporate Team Building. You will not only have fun but at the same time learn!

It will be a very interesting corporate team building experience. Employees will get the chance to shine and create their ultimate lunch or dinner buffet. It will also unite all corporate crew and staff for a fun-filled, nutritious, entertaining, and hilarious cooking demonstration.

For more details log on to http://www.foodandhealth.com.au/corporateteambuilding

A Healthy Corporate Team Building

Corporate Team Building is not just all about having fun. But, you can also learn on how important good health and wellbeing is. And you will learn all these by doing a Corporate Team Building cooking class at Food and Health. They offer culinary classes for team building events that use healthy food for cooking.
So for more information, log on to http://www.foodandhealth.com.au/corporateteambuilding

From: bestads.com

Corporate Team Building Christmas Function Sessions

December 3, 2010 – Byron Bay, NSW, Australia – Food and Health– offered corporate team building Christmas function cooking sessions.

Food and Health has offered corporate team building Christmas function cooking sessions. They specialized in cooking food for luxury health retreats. They also created fun, dynamic, and interactive Corporate Chef experiences for corporate team building incentives.

They brought the corporate team together that created an amazing, fun and safe corporate team building. Food and Health offered in-house and on-site corporate team building events around Australia.

Food and Health interactive kitchen boot camp challenged employees with a hands-on cooking experience. The guests and the facilitators made the ultimate buffet lunch for the corporate team building Christmas function.

The corporate employees presented the informative, entertaining, nutritious and hilarious cooking demonstrations. It incorporated the healing cuisines of the past and present with the culinary principles of the classical way.

Their sessions were the perfect pick-me-up that nurtured the staff during the winter. It reduced absenteeism and revitalized the staff. It was the perfect corporate team building Christmas party. For their entrée, it was an exceptional PowerPoint presentation that was available in seasonal, bimonthly or monthly workshops.

The aim was to educate the staff of the huge amount of nutrition information available. It helped participants understand the fundamentals of good health and well being combined with a highly motivating experience.

Food and Health main course was the three hour cooking workshop for up to 20 guests. It combined nutritional information and seasonal produce. Then for the degustation, it was culinary Olympics. It allowed corporate staff to discover their hidden talents. They competed with their fellow staff and each team made different dishes that ultimately assembled the lunch or dinner buffet.

It was a great way for the corporate team building Christmas function! For more details about corporate team building log on to http://www.foodandhealth.com.au/corporateteambuilding

From: seenation.com

Culinary Activities for Corporate Team Building

Instead of the usual corporate team building activities, why not try culinary activities for the staff? It is a unique and at the same time educational experience for professionals. They will learn the proper preparation of food and make attractive and delicious meals for the corporate team building buffet. It also enhances the relationship of the employees and leadership coaching.

Food and Heath as a wellness company provides safe and fun culinary sessions for corporate team building activities. Its goal is to bring corporate individuals together in a fun, safe and awesome culinary arts experience. It is a great alternative for a typical corporate team building activities.

Their Corporate Chef Masterclass can cater from 16 to 60 people. It is available in an in-house and on-site corporate team building events around Australia. This kind of corporate team building activity unites the staff. It is also the perfect pick-me-up for nurturing staff to health.

Learning and cooking together as an activity for the corporate team building is a great way to bond with your fellow employees. It is a wonderful way to discover your hidden talent, excel in this new area, and share knowledge with others.

Food and Health culinary activities for corporate team building reduce the absenteeism rate of the staff and it revitalizes them for spring. It is also a motivational training incentive wherein professionals can learn how to cook simple, quick, nutritious and delicious dishes. Food that is perfect for team fitness events or the perfect Christmas party.

This type of corporate team building allows participants to perform on-the-spot cooking challenges in front of their colleagues and facilitators. It is really a great way to get into this type of team building. You learn while having fun!

For more details log on to http://www.foodandhealth.com.au/corporateteambuilding
